General.Name: Tedea Technological Development and Automation Ltd
General.Description: Tedea Technological Development and Automation Ltd., through its subsidiaries, manufactures, imports, markets, and sells building products.in Israel. It is also involved in managing and investing activities. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.
